item.title: Garbage QCloud CDN: From Getting Started to Giving Up?
item.description: I originally believed that at least in IaaS fundamentals — storage, compute, and networking — public cloud vendors could still make significant contributions. However, my personal experience with Tencent Cloud CDN shook that belief: domestic cloud vendors’ products and services are truly unbearable. Read more
